Package view

Class PhotoViewState

java.lang.Object
view.PhotoState
view.PhotoViewState
public class PhotoViewState
extends PhotoState
Substate that is entered from the NonAdminState when opening an album. Class is used to implement the functionality of the PhotoViewController.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.List<model.Photo> stockPhotos
    List of stock photo accessed from the PhotoController.

    • enter

      public void enter()
      Accessed when opening an album from NonAdminState. Method that sets the PhotoViewState to visisble. Sets up the current album's information.

      public PhotoState processEvent()
      Method to process event of Button press. Implements add, edit, open, remove, copy, move to, back, and logout button.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      PhotoState representing the current state of the application.
